placeAtLeast: Place at least one casino or sports bet each day
keepDoingThatUntil: Keep doing that until you are the only one left
thePromotionStarts: The promotion starts on 28th of April and will continue until there is one player left.
thePromotionIsOpen: The promotion is open to all users who have registered at the casino before 23:59 on 27th of April
onceThePromotionStarts: Once the promotion starts no new entrants will be admitted.
inOrderToParticipateIn: In order to participate in the promotion players must make at least one bet on the casino or on the sportsbook.
theSystemTimeisInGMT: The system time is in GMT. Therefore, the qualifying bet(s) need to be made between 00:00:01 GMT and 23:59:59 GMT to be considered for the promotion.
atTheEndOfEachMonth: At the end of each month all surviving players will participate in a raffle for the win of an iPhone 14
theBigPrizeIsA2021: The big prize is a 2021 Lamborghini Huracan or a cash equivalent.
theWinningPlayerShould: The winning player should investigate the local regulations concerning importing a car from the EU and any related taxes and registration fees.
importTaxesAnd: Import taxes and registration fees are not included in this promotion.
ifThePromotionReaches: If the promotion reaches a stage where only 10 players are left, they can enter in agreement to share the prize in currency equivalent.
theCurrencyEquivalentOf: The currency equivalent of Lamborghini is EUR 250,000.
theSiteGeneral: The site general Terms and Conditions apply
aPlayerCanWinTheIphone: A player can win the iPhone prize only once during the course of this promotion.
theMinimunAcumulated: The minimum accumulated daily betting amount for this promotion is EUR 10.
casinolyIsOperated: GreatWin is operated by Buton Group and operating under Curacao license No. 8048/JAZ
weUnderstandThatAnything: We understand that anything can happen so there will be a Joker day - a player can skip one day (Joker day) of playing and still be in the game.
thisEssentiallyMeans: This essentially means that missing more than 1 day of betting will lead to elimination from the promotion. No need to announce Joker day in advance, nor after the fact - we will automatically factor it in.
